byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Ian Austen from Ottawa, Aurelien Breeden and Benoît Morenne from Paris, Sewell Chan from London, Yufan Huang from Beijing, Hari Kumar from New Delhi, Neil MacFarquhar from Moscow, Catherine Porter from Toronto, and Dionne Searcey from Maiduguri, Nigeria.

lead_paragraph: The president’s rambling, defiant performance in a televised session with the news media was unsettling for many international observers, but not all.
snippet: The president’s rambling, defiant performance in a televised session with the news media was unsettling for many international observers, but not all....

headline.main: Trump News Conference Provokes Anxiety, Humor and Shrugs Around World
headline.print_headline: Watching Trump From Abroad With Sarcasm, Silence and Scorn
